name: Roulette Rumble (DarrenDV)
description:
Our GMTK Game Jam 2022 submission. Your goal is to survive for as long as possible on the spinning roulette table of death whilst a dice is thrown periodically to add random modifiers to the arena. 

Controls: WASD to move, SPACE to jump, MOUSE to look around.

Made by: Darren, Jelle, Oliver & Mika
